title: 服务器出现了a fatal error has occurred,this connection is terminated
author: as3091955
txt_content:
服务器用玩家号去玩的时候，突然间出现了：“a fatal error has occurred,this connection is terminated ”
怎么办？

replies.author: 迷途的村庄
replies.txt_content:
能否讲的具体点？
a fatal error has occurred,this connection is terminated
【发生致命错误,这个连接终止】

replies.author: as3091955
replies.txt_content:
迷途的村庄 发表于 2015-7-16 21:23
能否讲的具体点？
a fatal error has occurred,this connection is terminated
【发生致命错误,这个连接终 ...
没什么详细的，我就在游玩期间，突然间就退出，然后报错。

replies.author: 迷途的村庄
replies.txt_content:
as3091955 发表于 2015-7-16 21:25
没什么详细的，我就在游玩期间，突然间就退出，然后报错。
